dsmvengnote:forceUppercase.description: Attribute specifying whether Note Text should be forced to be uppercase

dsmvengnote:noteTemplateText.description: Note Text for this Engineering Note Template

dsmvengnote:standardResources.description: Retrieve standard resources pointed by Engineering Note Template

dsmvengnote:noteOwner.description: Reference object that owns this Engineering Note

dsmvengnote:noteText.description: Note Text for this Engineering Note

dsmvengnote:noteScope.description: Engineering Note target scope (GENERAL, COMPONENTS, or 3D)

dsmvengnote:noteDownstreamUsage.description: KEEP/IGNORE: if set to IGNORE, Engineering Note will be ignored in downstream usage (MBOM or Process definition)

dsmvengnote:entries.description: Retrieve list of entries defining Engineering Note Text

dsmvengnote:count.description: Retrieve number of Engineering Notes for this reference item

dsmvengnote:templateEntries.description: Retrieve list of entries defining Engineering Note Template Text

dsmvengnote:affectedInstances.description: Retrieve list of affected instances for Components/3D Notes
